keyMoments.title: Baskerville Revealed as Three People
keyMoments.description: Baskerville is revealed to be three close friends - Bas, And, and Kerville - who act as one body. As Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, he commands the courthouse and the Just Eleven Jurymen.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a unique character concept and establishes the courthouse's defensive structure.
keyMoments.quote: We are Baskerville, Chief Justice of Enies Lobby!

reveals.information: Baskerville is actually three people working as one

keyMoments.title: Franky's Coup de Boo Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Coup de Boo technique for the first time, a fart-based propulsion attack that allows him to escape with Robin while breaking his chains.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of one of Franky's signature comedic yet effective techniques.

abilities.description: Franky inflates his buttocks and releases compressed gas in a powerful fart that propels him forward with explosive force.

relationships.description: Franky helps Robin escape and tries to convince her to accept the Straw Hats' rescue.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky uses Coup de Boo to escape with Robin and bring her into view of Luffy.

reveals.information: Franky can use compressed gas to create explosive propulsion attacks

keyMoments.title: Robin Refuses Rescue
keyMoments.description: Robin tells Luffy and the crew that she doesn't want to be rescued and expresses a desire to die, stemming from her deep-seated trauma and feelings of unworthiness.
keyMoments.significance: Critical emotional moment that reveals Robin's internal conflict and sets up the iconic 'I want to live' scene.
keyMoments.quote: I won't return. This isn't what I want. When did I ask you to rescue me?

reveals.information: Robin's suicidal thoughts and belief that she brings misfortune to those around her

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Unconditional Support
keyMoments.description: Luffy responds to Robin's refusal by offering unconditional support, telling her she can say whatever she wants but should say it by their side.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's emotional maturity and unique approach to friendship, which becomes crucial in breaking through Robin's barriers.
keyMoments.quote: Go ahead and say you want to die, or something. But say those things by our side!

keyMoments.title: Oimo Blocks the Marines
keyMoments.description: Oimo actively stops the Marines from advancing, explaining that he still holds a grudge for being lied to about his captains for 50 years.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the consequences of the World Government's deception and the giants' commitment to helping the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: We still have a beef with you Marines who made us waste 50 years by lying to us!

keyMoments.title: Kashii Throws Sogeking
keyMoments.description: Kashii throws Sogeking up to the courthouse roof, helping the Straw Hats complete their assembly.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the giants' active support of the Straw Hats and completes the crew's reunion.

keyMoments.title: Spandam's Cruel Enjoyment
keyMoments.description: Spandam takes sadistic pleasure in watching Robin refuse the Straw Hats' rescue attempt, enjoying their apparent suffering.
keyMoments.significance: Further establishes Spandam as a cruel villain and contrasts with the Straw Hats' genuine friendship.
keyMoments.quote: Look at them suffer! This is wonderful!
